field.label: Enable OPNblock
field.help: Turn off and on OPNblock's service. This will not control your Unbound DNS server instance.

field.label: Whitelist
field.help: Enter simple whitelist regex entries, such as /(api.solvemedia.com)/ seperated by a space.

field.label: Blacklist
field.help: Enter your list of external host-file URL's (both http:// or https://). They must be in host-file format, eg. 0.0.0.0 domain.com. Please note that pihole styled lists, containing simple domains, are not yet supported by OPNblock.
